column2: The  question arise  here  is  whether the Petitioner is  entitled to make an  application to
the  subject  matter  to  the  application  namely
Planning  of water resources  falls  within  the  concurrent  list.  Therefore,  an  application

column1: under Article 154 P will  not be applicable. Since this matter was  concluded at the High
Court,  we  proceed to consider the judgment of the said  court.
